channel.title: Hello Item commands
channel.description:
Why can't I do the
::item 995 50000
or something like that so I can get items? It's been a long time since I've been here, so something has changed?
I just want to log onto a server, get items, and go killing monsters, that's it!

item.title: Hello Item commands
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“X SNIPER STUD X, post:3, topic:54553”]1. You’ll have to type 0995 50000 for it to work.

  1. You’ll have to be an admin if you are on a real working server.[/quote]

As sniper stud said, you need to be admin. Are you sre your adim?

Read full topic

item.title: Hello Item commands
item.dc:creator: @mattgg mattgg
item.description:
@mattgg wrote:

I’ve tried that…all I’ve done is downloaded Moparscape…then phonescape, then created an character

then typed 0995 50000 and nothing happens…am I missing some text or something? Thanks for the reply Sniper Stud

Read full topic

item.title: Hello Item commands
item.dc:creator: @X_SNIPER_STUD_X X SNIPER STUD X
item.description:
@X_SNIPER_STUD_X wrote:

  1. You’ll have to type 0995 50000 for it to work.

  2. You’ll have to be an admin if you are on a real working server.

Read full topic

item.title: Hello Item commands

item.description:
@ablam1 wrote:

WELL IF THATS IT PLAY RUNESCAPE
BUT IF U ARENT A MOD/ADMIN U CANT SPAWN ITEMS
